# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5)).

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (not present in the logs, but a stone-furnace is present at position (60.0, -60.0)) and a burner-inserter at position (60.5, -61.5).

### Copper cable factory
Not present in the logs.

### Pipe network at position(107.5, -34.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5)), multiple pipes, and a boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)).

### Electricity network at position(119.5, -30.5)
Consists of a small-electric-pole at position (119.5, -30.5) and a steam-engine at position (117.5, -30.5).

### Belt network at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of two belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5).


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when refueling the boiler
- Make sure to have coal in the inventory to refuel the boiler.
### Errors when connecting the steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a fluid source, such as a boiler.
### Errors when using the offshore pump
- No errors found in the logs.
### Errors when using the burner-inserter
- Ensure that the burner-inserter has a source of items to pick up.
### Errors when using the stone-furnace
- Ensure that the stone-furnace has ingredients to smelt.


# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables are defined in the logs.
